message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm happy to meet you halfway on this.  How about $9,500? This would allow me to make a reasonable profit, and I believe it's still a fair price for the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement!
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $9,200. Can you consider this offer?
